column4: Hello. I have installed kubuntu, it went through fine. But when I try to get into X, it says 'Fatal error: no screens found' Yes yes, I have tried dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg, trying many different drivers and settings. It still will not boot.
My specs are: AMD Athlon 64 3400+, 1 gig ram, ATI Radeon x800 gto
could you post /etc/X11/xorg.conf over at pastebin.com?
